message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate the deal, but I'm looking to pay closer to $90.  What do you think?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $95.
